sentences.en: Concrete structures are also usually assumed to deform linearly.
sentences.cn: 混凝土结构通常也假设成线性变形.

sentences.en: DEFORM - 3 D software used in this article is a perfect plastic forming emulation software.
sentences.cn: 本文模拟所利用的DEFORM-3D 软件就是一款优秀的塑性成形仿真软件.

sentences.en: Deforming resistance is capability of material resisting deform.
sentences.cn: 变形抗力是材料本身抵抗塑性变形的能力.

sentences.en: How do engineering materials deform when bearing mechanical loads?
sentences.cn: 如何做工程材料变形时,轴承机械载荷?

sentences.en: Ice crystals begin to deform measurably.
sentences.cn: 冰晶就产生某种程度的变形了.

sentences.en: In severe cases, it can deform joints and cripple its victims.
sentences.cn: 严重的病例, 可使关节变形,使病人残废.

sentences.en: Severe variations deform the discharge curves.
sentences.cn: 严重者使放电曲线发生畸变.

sentences.en: Shoes that are too tight deform the feet.
Sitting badly for long periods of time can deform your spine.
sentences.cn: 长期坐姿不良会使脊柱变形.

sentences.en: Sometimes, however, the ability of bars to deform appreciably in torsion is put to good use.
sentences.cn: 但是, 有时要利用杆件在扭转时具有可观变形的能力.

sentences.en: Stresses applied to plastically deform the metal are usually compressive.
sentences.cn: 适用于金属塑性变形的应力通常都是压应力.

sentences.en: Stretch and bi stretch to deform.
The article from practice, it introduced the study on isothermal extrusion using the deform.
sentences.cn: 从等温挤压的实践出发, 概要地介绍了Deform在等到温挤压研究中应用.

sentences.en: The disease had deformed his spine.
The shale beds in between generally deform plastically.
sentences.cn: 夹在其中的页岩层通常是塑性变形.

sentences.en: The strike orientation of two sub - belts are controlled by transfer faults are characterized with segmented deform.
sentences.cn: 酒泉盆地南缘山前褶皱冲断带以北祁连北缘断裂为界,倾向方向划分为两个带,走向方向受调节断层的控制,分段变形.

sentences.en: Wearing badly-fitting shoes can deform your feet.
sentences.cn: 穿不合脚的鞋会使脚变形。

words.tran_cn: 畸形；畸形的人或物；道德方面的缺陷
使...残缺，使...变形（deform的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to change or spoil the usual or natural shape of sth

trans.tran_cn: 使变形，使残废，使变丑，毁伤…的形体
